name: Flippy Bard
description:
A simple project that is a very slight twist on the Flappy Bird formula. I had issues with my HTML5 exports for the game (certain assets seemed to be missing) so this will be download only for the time being. If there's some interest in playing the game via browser I'll dig into the situation further to see if I can find a fix. Hope you enjoy!

All visual artwork, sound/music, coding, and design done by Stellan Sandberg with the exception of the font being used (Gang of Three font by Vic Fieger, https://www.dafont.com/vic-fieger.d852).

The tools I used for this project were:

Godot (Game engine)

Aseprite (Pixel art tool)

BoscaCeoil (nifty little music tool, also used this to make the strum sound fx)

Audacity (audio file editing, used to create impact sound fx)
